descriptionHtml:
The Poacher's Den
A Quest Mod for Hunters

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53789-1-1399343321.jpg[/img]

On the shores of Lake Ilinalta lives a bosmer poacher named
Tanis and his wife Amaya. Even though Tanis is quite proud
of his hunting abilities, he still needs help sometimes. That
is where you come in. Help Tanis by finding pelts and other
items from the hunt, and he will give you rare enchanted
items as a reward. At the moment, there are 10 different
quests to do for helping Tanis. There will be more in the future.

This mod includes:
10 new enchanted items
8 new foods

If you want a more challenging approach to this mod,
I recommend the mod Hunterborn.

Requires:
Skyrim & The latest update

Future Plans for This Mod:
* Voices (If you are interested in either Tanis or Amaya's role, PM me.)
* More quests

Mod Conflicts:
Aurora Village
Any other mod that edits that location.

If you can guess where the mod got its name, I'll give you a cookie. :)
I hope you enjoy my mod.
author: MimiTheAlchemist
